description:
Greyson Harper is back!
I adore this guy. Very friendly and eager to please. This summary really isn�t about the video, which does show how both these guys love to have sex.
Before his last scheduled shoot, he got in a bad car accident, pretty much shattering his arm. He texted me a pic from the hospital and apologized for not being able to make the shoot. Meh, he was flying on SWA, so I just put the flight on hold and once he got back up and about, we could rebook. One of many reasons I prefer booking models in cities that SWA fly out from.
They patched him up, and he finally was healthy enough to get back in the gym. He would send me updates and we finally cashed in on his ticket. Sorry if the scar is a bit distracting, but he really was eager to have sex on film again and both he and Jacob had an amazing time.
Greyson also managed to land a really good job, and he starts that in a month, so feel like he will make an appearance here and there on ChaosMen. 2019 was a bummer year for Greyson, and it looks like 2020 will be amazing!
title: Greyson Harper & Jacob Jax - RAW
